Container.Name: aws-cloud9-ssh
Container.Description: [h3]aws-cloud9-ssh[/h3] aws-cloud9-ssh[br][br] [b][span style=\'color: #E80000;\']Directions:[/span][/b][br] [b]/config[/b] : this path is where the container will look for the file authorized_keys[br] [b]/home/ec2-user/environment/project[/b] : this path will be available to the AWS Cloud9 environment[br]
